doc.title: Casta Diva
doc.plot: The film aims to mislead the audience into thinking that they are to expect a story with intense scenes of violence, whereas in fact what they are watching is the training process of a female gymnast. The existence of a conventional sports environment has only been hinted in the first scene, which takes place in a disguised, 'torture chamber' space. At least the truth is revealed - we see the girl, flying in the air, performing the elements she has been practicing, in the real sports space.
